com.aurel.track.report.dashboard

Class BasePluginDashboardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.report.dashboard.BasePluginDashboardView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPluginDashboard
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractIssueFilterDashboard, CalendarDash, ManagerView, MeetingsDashboard, ModifiedFiles, MyFilters, MyItems, MyWatch, ProjectFilterDashboardView, ProjectSummary, QuickSearchView, ReleaseNotes, ReportsAndFilters, TwoDimensionalStatistic, UserLoad, VersionControlActivity

    public abstract class BasePluginDashboardView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPluginDashboard
    An base implementation for dashboard plugin This class should be extended if you want to develop new dashboard plugin

      • convertMapFromPageConfig

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> convertMapFromPageConfig(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties,
                                                                        TPersonBean user,
                                                                        java.util.Locale locale,
                                                                        java.lang.Integer entityId,
                                                                        java.lang.Integer entityType,
                                                                        java.util.List<LabelValueBean> errors)
        Convert/obtain the parameters obtain from configuration page in to the persistent parameters. This implementation create a new map form configuration map, using toString from values. This implementation is usefully if you use only string values in configuration for dashboard. If you need some parameters in configuration that are not of type String, you should re-implement this method using proper conversion
        Specified by:
        convertMapFromPageConfig in interface IPluginDashboard
        Parameters:
        properties - the parameters from configuration page
        user - TPersonBean of the current user
        Returns:
        the persistent map of parameters associated to the field: Map
